queries.query: SELECT TOP 50 LEFT(MIN(LTRIM(st.text)), 60) as text, SUM(qs.total_worker_time) as worker_time, SUM(qs.total_clr_time) as clr_time, SUM(qs.execution_count) as executions, AVG(DATEDIFF(minute, qs.creation_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) as avg_creation FROM sys.dm_exec_query_stats qs CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(qs.sql_handle) as st GROUP BY qs.query_hash ORDER BY worker_time DESC, executions DESC
